DOC.brief_summary: To compare the effect of “point-of-care” (POC) analysis of blood work with traditional laboratory methods on length of stay in a pediatric emergency department (PED).
DOC.brief_title: Point of Care Device Use in the Pediatric Emergency Department
DOC.detailed_description: This study was a prospective, randomized controlled study of patients requiring blood work that a POC device was capable of performing. Length of time spent at various timepoints were prospectively recorded by a dedicated research assistant after randomization.
DOC.criteria: Clinically requiring bloodwork capable by the POC device Requiring other bloodwork such as medication levels, WBC
